document_data.name: House of Ilmater
document_data.mainbody: The '''House of Ilmater''' was a temple dedicated to [[Ilmater]] located in the city of [[Westgate]] in [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Location: The temple was located in the northwest section of the city at the intersection of [[Westgate Market Street]] and [[Wagonwheel Ride]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The temple was run by High Priest [[Hunn Irblast]]. Hunn was assisted by 6 other priests and 12 followers.
